comment: Two ways to say that ` A ` and ` B ` partition ` C ` (when ` A ` and ` B ` don't overlap and ` A ` is a part of ` C ` ). (Contributed by FL, 17-Nov-2008.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 14-Jul-2021.)
